description:
The white light The Third continue to monitor is expanding rapidly. It`s a spatial distortion created by Gravestone, an ultimate weapon left over from the Great War. Meanwhile, Honoka is on a job for Emporium`s chief administrator. On her way to the sand dragon nest, a dune buggy catches up to the tank, and the strange woman Honoka met earlier in town steps out...
Source: crunchyroll
